original_title: コンピューター革命 最強×最速の頭脳誕生
overview: Near future Tokyo, when augmented reality and robots have become ubiquitous, pervading almost every aspect of city life. Mako a high school senior navigates the vagaries of daily life. (Hideaki Sena's Anime Short)
title: The Computer Revolution: The Birth of the Most Powerful and Fastest Brains
